title: The Emperor's Bride
description: When Shuchun Jun is chosen as the seventh wife of a gluttonous old emperor, her peaceful life is over. To make matters worse, the emperor's lecherous son wonâ€™t stop flirting with her! The day before her wedding, Jun flees the imperial airship in favor of life on the run. In the Wild West town of Busybee, she encounters Flynn and Josiah Cole, a pair of outlaw brothers who offer her a chance for a brighter future. But what happens when the emperor catches up to her? The Emperor's Bride is a steampunk romance set in an alternate Wild West. It is the sixth book in the Belles & Bullets series. Featuring a new cast of characters, it can be enjoyed by new readers, as well as those who are familiar with the previous books.
author: Caylen McQueen
